dynamideForm.htmlsrc:
<html>
    <head>
    <title>Property Designer</title>
    </head>
        $session.getInclude("resources/js/scripts.js")
        $session.getInclude("resources/js/msdom.js")
        $session.getInclude("resources/js/windowing.js")
        $session.getInclude("resources/js/queryString.js")

    <script language='javascript'>
    <!--
    function framesetOnload(){
        QueryString_Parse(location);
        excludeArray = new Array();
        excludeArray["next"] = "true"; //any value will make it excluded
        excludeArray["action"] = "true";
        excludeArray["SESSIONID"] = "true";
        var qs = getQueryStringExcluding(QueryString, excludeArray);
        designertop.location = "/dynamide/ide?SESSIONID=$SESSIONID&next=designertop&"+qs;

    }

    var functionExpression = "";//"alert('initial');";

    function framehiddenOnload(){
        eval(functionExpression);
    }

    // -->
    </script>
    <frameset rows="100%,*" framespacing="0" onload="javascript:framesetOnload();" >
        <frame NAME="designertop" />
        <frame onload="javascript:framehiddenOnload();"
                src="/dynamide/ide?next=designerhidden&SESSIONID=$SESSIONID"
                NAME="designerhidden" />
    </frameset>
  </html>
